Title: Authorizes the city of New York to discontinue the use as parkland and alienate certain land within Ferry Point Park in the borough of the Bronx
Summary: Authorizes the city of New York to discontinue the use as parkland and alienate certain land within Ferry Point Park in the borough of the Bronx.
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing the city of New York to discontinue certain parkland in Ferry Point Park in the borough of the Bronx
